name: ZX Battle City
description:
Hi,

Allow me to present you my humble first ZX Spectrum game. It is a wish fulfilled after more than 35 years since I had my first computer (yes, it was our precious ZX Spectrum). I do things slowly but I keep my promises step by step :-)
The game is slow and very improvable but I have no more time or knowledge to keep working on it. It has taken me about 3 months and believe me, I never imagined all the work it needs.

Technical details and thanks:
- Mainly done in Basic and compiled with the zx Boriel compiler.
- Graphics routines were made using pure assembler embedded in basic (David Webb's book).
- The graphics and scenery were made in ZXPaintbrush.
- I got the music from Marc Alexander's website and the player tank sprite was created by @jarlaxe.
- It works with 48Kb models and later.
- The source code is on Github: Source

I hope you like it.
Thanks for reporting bugs
